/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the buildings and trees that line the street. The buildings, painted in shades of white and gray, stand tall against the overcast sky. Their facades are adorned with red and gold accents, adding a touch of color to the otherwise monochrome palette. The trees, devoid of leaves, stand bare against the winter sky, their branches reaching out into the cold air. Overhead, power lines crisscross the sky, connecting the buildings and creating a network of lines that intersect at various points along the street. The street itself is devoid of people and vehicles, adding a sense of tranquility to the scene. The image is bathed in the soft light of an overcast day, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings. Despite the absence of vibrant colors, the image exudes a certain charm, offering a glimpse into the quiet beauty of a winter's day in Beijing.
